Title: John B Chambers: Current Interests
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 21:06:07 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 1128 Last-Modified: Wednesday, 04-Dec-96 19:01:02 GMT John B Chambers: Current Interests Current Interests I'm especially interested in topics at the operations research / computer science interface , with a particular focus on adaptive heuristics for difficult optimization problems in operations management.
